mapper.select: select plan_status from planner where plan_no = #{value}

select P.plan_no as no , P.user_id as userId , P.plan_title as title , P.plan_start as startDate , P.plan_end as endDate , P.plan_member as member , P.create_date as createDate from planner P , planner_daily D where P.plan_no = D.plan_no and D.daily_key = #{value}
select plan_no as planNo , daily_key as "key" , daily_index as "index" , daily_date as "date" from planner_daily where plan_no = #{value} order by daily_index asc
select daily_date from planner_daily where daily_key = #{value}

select T.daily_key as "key" , T.trans_key as transKey , T.trans_category as category , L.location_name as startLocation , L.location_id as startlocationId , T.start_time as startTime , C.location_name as endLocation , C.location_id as endlocationId , T.end_time as endTime , T.trans_memo as memo , T.create_date as createDate from transportation T , locations L , locations C where T.start_location = L.location_id and T.end_location = C.location_id and T.daily_key = #{value} order by T.create_date asc

select P.plan_no as planNo , P.start_date as startDate , P.end_date as endDate , P.create_date as createDate , P.location_id as locationId , L.location_code as locationCode , L.location_name as locationName from planner_location P , Locations L where P.location_id = L.location_id and TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') >= P.start_date and TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') <= P.end_date and P.plan_no = #{pno} order by P.create_date asc

select P.plan_no as planNo , P.start_date as startDate , P.end_date as endDate , P.create_date as createDate , P.location_id as locationId , L.location_code as locationCode , L.location_name as locationName from planner_location P , Locations L where P.location_id = L.location_id and P.plan_no = #{value} order by P.create_date asc
select daily_key as "key" , tour_title as title , create_date as createDate , tour_key as tourKey from daily_tour where daily_key = #{value} order by create_date asc
select daily_key as "key" , hotel_title as title , hotel_term as term , create_date as createDate , hotel_key as hotelKey from daily_hotel where daily_key = #{value} order by create_date asc

select T.daily_key as "key" , T.trans_key as transKey , T.trans_category as category , L.location_name as startLocation , L.location_id as startlocationId , T.start_time as startTime , C.location_name as endLocation , C.location_id as endlocationId , T.end_time as endTime , T.trans_memo as memo , T.create_date as createDate from transportation T , locations L , locations C where T.start_location = L.location_id and T.end_location = C.location_id and T.trans_key = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into transportation (daily_key, trans_category, start_location, start_time, end_location, end_time, trans_memo, trans_key) values (#{key}, #{category}, #{startLocation}, #{startTime}, #{endLocation}, #{endTime}, #{memo}, #{transKey})
insert into planner_wallet (daily_key, wallet_category, wallet_title, wallet_key, wallet_frg_key) values (#{daily}, 'TRANS', #{title}, wallet_seq.nextval, #{frgKey})
insert into daily_tour (daily_key, tour_title, create_date, tour_key) values (#{key}, #{title}, sysdate, #{tourKey})
insert into daily_hotel (daily_key, hotel_title, hotel_term, create_date, hotel_key) values (#{key}, #{title}, #{term}, sysdate, #{hotelKey})
insert into planner_wallet (daily_key, wallet_category, create_date, wallet_title, wallet_key, wallet_frg_key) values (#{daily}, 'HOTEL', sysdate, #{title}, wallet_seq.nextval, #{frgKey})
mapper.select: select P.plan_no as planNo , P.start_date as startDate , P.end_date as endDate , P.create_date as createDate , P.location_id as locationId , L.location_code as locationCode , L.location_name as locationName from planner_location P , Locations L where P.location_id = L.location_id and P.plan_no = #{value} order by P.create_date asc

select user_id as userId , plan_title as title , to_char(plan_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate , to_char(plan_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate , plan_member as member , create_date as createDate , plan_status as status from planner where plan_no = #{value}
select U.user_id as id , U.user_status as status , U.user_profile as profile from planner P , planner_user U where P.user_id = U.user_id and P.plan_no = #{value}
select count(*) from Planner P , Likes L where P.plan_no = L.no and L.likes_category = 'PLANNER' and P.plan_no = #{value}
select count(*) from Planner P , Reply R where P.plan_no = R.no and R.rep_category = 'PLANNER' and P.plan_no = #{value}
select plan_start from planner where plan_no = #{value}
